Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11.2 with a standard deviation 2.8. The z-score of the person with 9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -2.2
* -0.79
* -0.28

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-2.2: Incorrect
-0.79: Correct
-0.28: Incorrect
